description: Configuration file for HP SKU CSV Processor

file_paths.note: Leave empty to be prompted, or specify absolute paths

processing_rules.note: Searches for 'search_value' in the target field and replaces with 'replace_value'

field_definitions.target_column: The column letter (e.g., 'R') containing JSON data
field_definitions.target_field_name: The JSON field name to search in (e.g., 'HP SKU')
field_definitions.search_value: The value to search for in the target field
field_definitions.replace_value: The value to replace search_value with
